mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,notice_id, notice_subject,notice_writer, notice_content, notice_date, notice_view from (select * from notice order by notice_id desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
select * from (select rownum rnum,notice_id, notice_subject,notice_writer, notice_content, notice_date, notice_view from (select * from notice order by notice_date desc)) where rnum <= 5
mapper.update: update notice set notice_view = notice_view + 1 where notice_id = #{notice_id}
